sbe:messageSchema.description: Example base schema which can be extended.

field.description: Price per share or contract. Conditionally required if the order type requires a price (not market orders)
field.name: Price

field.description: Number of shares or contracts ordered
field.name: OrderQty

field.description: Security ID as defined by CME. For the security ID list, see the security definition messages
field.name: SecurityID

field.description: Sequence number as assigned to message
field.name: SeqNum

field.description: Operator ID. Should be unique per Firm ID. Assigned value used to identify specific message originator. Represents last individual or team in charge of the system which modifies the order before submission to the Globex platform, or if not modified from initiator (party role=118), last individual or team in charge of the system, which submit the order to the Globex platform
field.name: SenderID

field.description: Unique identifier for Order as assigned by the buy-side (institution, broker, intermediary etc.). Uniqueness must be guaranteed within a single trading day. Firms, particularly those which electronically submit multi-day orders, trade globally or throughout market close periods, should ensure uniqueness across days, for example by embedding a date within the ClOrdID field
field.name: ClOrdID

field.description: Use OrderRequestID to identify a request to enter, modify or delete an order and echo the value on the ExecutionReport representing the response
field.name: OrderRequestID

field.description: Time when the message is sent. 64-bit integer expressing the number of nano seconds since midnight January 1, 1970.
field.name: SendingTimeEpoch

field.description: Specifies how long the order remains in effect
field.name: TimeInForce

field.description: Indicates if the order was initially received manually (as opposed to electronically)
field.name: ManualOrderIndicator
